summary: Zatoichi meets an infamous blind leader of a gangster organization as he contends with a gloomy ronin widower.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Reiko Ôhara|Pîtâ|Kazuko Yoshiyuki|Kô Nishimura|Ryûnosuke Kaneda|Kunie Tanaka|Osami Nabe|Jun Nagasawa|Utae Shôji|Reiji Shoji|Yôsuke Kondô|Kenzô Tabu|Yoshio Yoshida|Eizô Kitamura|Osamu Ôkawa|Akira Shimizu|Takumi Shinjo|Akane Kawasaki|Teruko Ômi|Yasuhiro Mizukami|Yoshitarô Asawaka|Ryûtarô Gomi|Yûji Hamada|Kazue Tamaki|Yukio Horikita|Takuya Kitano|Gen Kuroki|Shingo Ibuki|Kanae Kobayashi|Jun Katsumura|Junjiro Niizeki|Masaji Nunome|Jun Satomi|Akira Nitta|Kazuko Taniguchi|Tadashi Takadera|Yutaka Miki|Masayuki Mori|Tatsuya Nakadai
title: Zatôichi abare-himatsuri
